dict.acceptation: 犹豫，踌躇；不愿；支吾；停顿；

sent.orig: He who hesitate is lost.Never hesitate.
sent.trans: 犹豫错失机会。决不犹豫。

sent.orig: If you change your mind, do not hesitate to give us a call.
sent.trans: 如果您改变了主意，请不要客气打电话给我们。

sent.orig: Please do not hesitate to ask the instructors, in person or via e-mail, for assistance.
sent.trans: 请踊跃请求指导教授的协助，举例来说，亲自或者以电子邮件询问。

sent.orig: In case you need something, please don't hesitate to ask me.
sent.trans: 如果你需要什么东西，请不客气地对我说。

sent.orig: He do not hesitate to ask her to sit beside him.
sent.trans: 他毫不犹豫地请她坐在他身旁。
